messages.msgSnippet: Ok, thanks to all those who answer me. The new link is http://tinyurl.com/4ptgy  (same than before but shorter), I ll try a window and I ll send the new
messages.messageBody:
Ok, thanks to all those who answer me. The new link is
http://tinyurl.com/4ptgy (same than before but shorter), I'll try a window
and
I'll send the new pictures, just give me time.
Thanks again
Máximo

PS. Fontenla Bros., esta a tu disposición cuando quieras.

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] My first nihon to
messages.msgSnippet: Te felicito Maximo Me pone muy contento ¡¡¡¡QUIERO VERLA!!!!! Eduardo Maximo  wrote: Please can anyone give me some data about this
messages.messageBody:
Te felicito Maximo
Me pone muy contento
¡¡¡¡QUIERO VERLA!!!!!
Eduardo

Maximo <Maximo@...> wrote:
Please can anyone give me some data about this sword
(http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst?&.dir=/Maximo&.src=gr
&.view=t&.url=http%3a//us.f1.yahoofs.com/groups/g_9963731/Maximo/total%2bsin
%2bflash.jpg%3fbcConLxBdcVgJ6Zn&.cx=150&.cy=16&.type=u). I buy it, and I
can´t find much data, not before make a window. I guess: Mumei, itame hada,
I can't find hammon or is too high, shiho zume because it has two hagire in
the mune but bouth stops 1 mm before shinogihi, and one big that I send a
picture, O kissaki or shobu zukuri, the mekugiana has not been driller with
a machine (more like made it with a punch),It has not kesho yasurime is like
yasuri (just a few scratches on the nakago), nagasa 66.4 cm., sori 1.6 cm.,
motohaba 3.2 cm., sakihaba 2.3 cm., motokasane 0.8 cm., sakikasane 0.5 cm.,
nakago 19.6 cm.
Thanks in advance
Máximo
PS. And if you can, give some value
thanks again

messages.subject: My first nihon to
messages.msgSnippet: Please can anyone give me some data about this sword (http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst?&.dir=/Maximo&.src=gr
messages.messageBody:
Please can anyone give me some data about this sword
(http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst?&.dir=/Maximo&.src=gr
&.view=t&.url=http%3a//us.f1.yahoofs.com/groups/g_9963731/Maximo/total%2bsin
%2bflash.jpg%3fbcConLxBdcVgJ6Zn&.cx=150&.cy=16&.type=u). I buy it, and I
can´t find much data, not before make a window. I guess: Mumei, itame hada,
I can't find hammon or is too high, shiho zume because it has two hagire in
the mune but bouth stops 1 mm before shinogihi, and one big that I send a
picture, O kissaki or shobu zukuri, the mekugiana has not been driller with
a machine (more like made it with a punch),It has not kesho yasurime is like
yasuri (just a few scratches on the nakago), nagasa 66.4 cm., sori 1.6 cm.,
motohaba 3.2 cm., sakihaba 2.3 cm., motokasane 0.8 cm., sakikasane 0.5 cm.,
nakago 19.6 cm.
Thanks in advance
Máximo
PS. And if you can, give some value
thanks again
